metadata.synopsis: Player summons flesh golem but the player's enemies are the golem's allies. Player character comments on this to clarify this to the actual player
metadata.how_to_trigger: Start a combat agains one of the golem's allies and summon it using the bell. When the golem is summoned it will play SHA_FleshGolem_AD_TurnsAgainstPlayer - this AD is played in response to that finishing or failing

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Not keen on fighting its allies. Should've figured.
